Posts.EditableText: So I've been working on this game for a good bit, and I feel comfortable with what I'd consider to be a sort of teaser or demo for what would be a much longer game overall. Is it still acceptable to upload saying that it's a demo? or is that not allowed?
Posts.HTML: So I've been working on this game for a good bit, and I feel comfortable with what I'd consider to be a sort of teaser or demo for what would be a much longer game overall. Is it still acceptable to upload saying that it's a demo? or is that not allowed?

Posts.EditableText:
Depends on how big the demo is.

The is a games feed back thread on here, if that's what you want.

Just make sure you have a description on all your "looks" for the first few objects. I don't know why they look at that in particular, but they do....
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
There's a **Work in progress** thingy to click on during the publishing process.

...and there's a **Sandbox** category, which I believe is for ...

What is that for?

**@XanMag**!!!  What's the difference between those two methods of publishing?

---
You can also leave the game unlisted when you publish it and create a post in **Game Announcements and Feedback** with a link to your page.  We'll still be able to play it, but only with the link you provide.
Posts.HTML:
There's a Work in progress thingy to click on during the publishing process.

...and there's a Sandbox category, which I believe is for ...

What is that for?

@XanMag!!! What's the difference between those two methods of publishing?

You can also leave the game unlisted when you publish it and create a post in Game Announcements and Feedback with a link to your page. We'll still be able to play it, but only with the link you provide.

Posts.EditableText:
Work in Progress = authentic category
Sandbox = default category they put miniature, unpolished games in. I'm not even sure if you can select that option...!
Posts.HTML:
Work in Progress = authentic category
Sandbox = default category they put miniature, unpolished games in. I'm not even sure if you can select that option...!

Posts.EditableText: Well, it's 32 pages in total, and it's done in the style of a gamebook. So as for the length... That really depends on how fast you read, which ending you get, etc. The Work in Progress category seems to fit it best, right?
Posts.HTML: Well, it's 32 pages in total, and it's done in the style of a gamebook. So as for the length... That really depends on how fast you read, which ending you get, etc. The Work in Progress category seems to fit it best, right?

Posts.EditableText: Yes.  Toss in WIP.  Sandbox is kind of for the... clunkers.  Clunkers like Furby McQuack.  :)
